name: observations
title: observations
description: Table of all observations associated with the equipement, retrieval or control of a tag

fields.name: tag_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the tag. Foreign key to [`tags.tag_id`](/core/tags#tag_id).

fields.name: datetime
fields.description: Date and time of the observation. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: location_name
fields.description: Name given to the deployment location.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the observation location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the observation location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: observation_type
fields.description:
Type of observation. 
 - `equipment`: Attachement of the tag on the species
 - `retrieval`: Recapture and removal of the tag from the species
 - `recapture`: Recapture of the species AFTER an equipment observation but without removing the tag. This option also covers the case of recapturing a bird without device (choose `missing`in `device_status`) or the case of a recapture happening after a ` retrieval`.
 - `sighting`: An form of knowledge of existance of the bird on a date and location beside ringing (e.g. direct observation in the field with color ring)
 - `other`: Other type of observations. Avoid using this, and always provide an `observation_comments` in such cases.

fields.name: device_status
fields.description: Status of the device/tag. Assumed to be `present` if not provided. Always provide an `observation_comments` if using `other`.

fields.name: observer
fields.description: The name of an individual or group that observed the observation.

fields.name: life_stage
fields.description: Age class or life stage which can be entered as . See [EURING Exchange Code](https://euring.org/files/documents/E2020ExchangeCodeV201.pdf).

fields.name: sex
fields.description: Sex of the tagged species which can be enetered according to different standard (full string, single letter or number). See [EURING Exchange Code](https://euring.org/files/documents/E2020ExchangeCodeV201.pdf).

fields.name: condition
fields.description: Condition of the tagged species. See [EURING Exchange Code](https://euring.org/files/documents/E2020ExchangeCodeV201.pdf). Assumed to be `alive` if not provided

fields.name: mass
fields.description: Mass of the tagged species. See [EURING Exchange Code](https://euring.org/files/documents/E2020ExchangeCodeV201.pdf). Expressed in grams.

fields.name: additional_metric
fields.description: A list of additional measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions about the record. Recommended best practice is to use a key:value encoding schema for a data interchange format such as JSON.

fields.name: observation_comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the observation.
